publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2148 Hugh Henry: Scottish Examination System—That the Parliament notes the substantial progress made in relation to the Scottish examination process; congratulates everyone involved – the pupils on their achievements, the teachers on their efforts in helping to make the system work, the Scottish Qualifications Authority (SQA) on the improvements introduced, and the Scottish Executive on its commitment to ensuring a smooth process and providing the investment to make the system work; notes that further investigation is required to refine and improve both the examination process and the workings of the SQA, and asks that the Scottish Executive undertake an early review of both the SQA and the structure of the examinations, including internal assessments.
S1M-2148 Scottish Examination System (lodged on 31 August 2001) Trish Godman*
S1M-2148 Scottish Examination System (lodged on 31 August 2001) Robert Brown*, Brian Fitzpatrick*
S1M-2148 Scottish Examination System (lodged on 31 August 2001) Maureen Macmillan*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Cathy Jamieson*
S1M-2148 Scottish Examination System (lodged on 31 August 2001) Cathie Craigie*, Dr Richard Simpson*

S1M-2148 Hugh Henry: Scottish Examination System-That the Parliament notes the substantial progress made in relation to the Scottish examination process; congratulates everyone involved - the pupils on their achievements, the teachers on their efforts in helping to make the system work, the Scottish Qualifications Authority (SQA) on the improvements introduced, and the Scottish Executive on its commitment to ensuring a smooth process and providing the investment to make the system work; notes that further investigation is required to refine and improve both the examination process and the workings of the SQA, and asks that the Scottish Executive undertake an early review of both the SQA and the structure of the examinations, including internal assessments. Supported by: Trish Godman, Robert Brown, Brian Fitzpatrick, Maureen Macmillan, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Cathy Jamieson, Cathie Craigie, Dr Richard Simpson, Donald Gorrie*
S1M-2148 Scottish Examination System (lodged on 31 August 2001) Mr Michael McMahon*
S1M-2148 Scottish Examination System (lodged on 31 August 2001) Scott Barrie*
S1M-2148 Scottish Examination System (lodged on 31 August 2001) Elaine Smith*
S1M-2148 Scottish Examination System (lodged on 31 August 2001) Margaret Jamieson*, Nora Radcliffe*, Karen Gillon*

S1M-2148 Hugh Henry: Scottish Examination System—That the Parliament notes the substantial progress made in relation to the Scottish examination process; congratulates everyone involved – the pupils on their achievements, the teachers on their efforts in helping to make the system work, the Scottish Qualifications Authority (SQA) on the improvements introduced, and the Scottish Executive on its commitment to ensuring a smooth process and providing the investment to make the system work; notes that further investigation is required to refine and improve both the examination process and the workings of the SQA, and asks that the Scottish Executive undertake an early review of both the SQA and the structure of the examinations, including internal assessments. Supported by: Trish Godman, Robert Brown, Brian Fitzpatrick, Maureen Macmillan, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Cathy Jamieson, Cathie Craigie, Dr Richard Simpson, Donald Gorrie, Mr Michael McMahon, Scott Barrie, Elaine Smith, Margaret Jamieson, Nora Radcliffe, Karen Gillon
S1M-2148 Scottish Examination System (lodged on 31 August 2001) Rhoda Grant*, Irene Oldfather*
S1M-2148 Scottish Examination System (lodged on 31 August 2001) Tavish Scott*, Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-2148 Scottish Examination System (lodged on 31 August 2001) Cathy Peattie*, Pauline McNeill*

Supported by: Trish Godman, Robert Brown, Brian Fitzpatrick, Maureen Macmillan, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Cathy Jamieson, Cathie Craigie, Dr Richard Simpson, Donald Gorrie, Mr Michael McMahon, Scott Barrie, Elaine Smith, Margaret Jamieson, Nora Radcliffe, Karen Gillon, Rhoda Grant, Irene Oldfather, Tavish Scott, Mr Keith Raffan, Cathy Peattie, Pauline McNeill
S1M-2148 Scottish Examination System (lodged on 31 August 2001) Karen Whitefield*
